workers.goal: Diagnose worker visibility and make dashboard reliably show active workers/logs/progress.
done_when: Dashboard always shows active worker rows while jobs are running.
Log View opens in dedicated modal/window and does not overlay the whole main page.
Worker state, activity, and latest update timestamp refresh consistently.

workers.goal: Fix machine monitor connection reliability and tool/preset loading reliability on problematic machines.
done_when: INSPECT login/cwd table-path noise is suppressed or fallback-handled.
Switching across problem machines keeps connection stable without thread leak warnings.
Tool table/preset table loads recover consistently after machine switching.

workers.goal: Enforce iTNC530 coolant mapping M17 out-air, M8 out-oil, M18 in-oil consistently across monitor paths.
done_when: Both machining_auto and monitor_server resolve iTNC530 coolant labels identically.
Live summary and detail view show the same mapping outputs.
No mapping regression for TNC640 path.

workers.goal: Apply dark concept layout on main page and move secondary information to detail page.
done_when: Main page uses dark concept palette and hierarchy like provided reference.
Secondary/verbose info moved to detail page to reduce clutter.
No overlap on 2K/4K and controls remain usable.

workers.goal: Add SQLite-backed login flow and themed login dialog with company logo. Seed admin/1234.
done_when: Login required before entering monitor server UI.
Auth data stored in SQLite with seeded admin/1234 on first run.
Themed login dialog matches dark concept and shows company logo.

workers.goal: Run targeted validation for tasks 1-5 and produce command/result report with pass/fail checklist.
done_when: Validation commands are executed and outputs summarized.
Connection/tool-preset/coolant/login/ui scenarios are each explicitly verified.
Report includes reproducible run commands and residual issues.
